rules_text: Until end of turn, target creature you control gets +2/+0 and gains “When this creature dies, return it to its owner's hand, then create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a Spirit.” [i](It loses its other creature types.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]When Hana died in the Holt, she was overjoyed to wake up unharmed in her bed... until the next day, when she saw herself limping back down the path.[/i]
